summary: The Russian crook steals the stolen giant diamond from the mafia, hides it and suddenly runs into his unbeknown brothers. The unexpected and absurd events with participation of mob, doctors, musicians, Americans, militia and gypsies ensue.
cast: Valeriy Garkalin|Vera Alentova|Inna Churikova|Igor Ugolnikov|Leonid Kuravlyov|Lyubov Polishchuk|Aleksandr Pankratov-Chyornyy|Mikhail Kokshenov|Valeriy Afanasev|Yevgeni Aleksandrov|Nina Alisova|Irina Apeksimova|Sergey Artsibashev|Sergey Batalov|Lev Borisov|Aleksey Buldakov|Elena Bushueva|Rolan Bykov|Yuriy Chernov|Armen Dzhigarkhanyan|Oleg Efremov|Sergey Gabrielyan|Viktor Gajnov|Evgeniy Gerchakov|Maksim Glotov|Marina Golub|Vladimir Gusev|Arkadiy Koval|Tatyana Kravchenko|Yuriy Kuzmenkov|Anatoliy Kuznetsov|Ivan Martynov|Vladimir Menshov|Pyotr Merkurev|Nonna Mordyukova|Valeriy Nikolaev|Redd Ochoa|Sergey Ruban|Vsevolod Sanaev|Vladimir Shiryaev|Boris Smorchkov|Oleg Tabakov|Evgeniy Vesnik|Aleksandr Voroshilo|Andrey Zvyagintsev
title: Shirli-myrli
